specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Washer Washer is a post-treatment mainly applied to woven fabrics with a sturdy structure. Through washing processes, it induces slight shrinkage and creates natural creases and streaks, adding a vintage-like appearance and texture to the fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Performance Water Repellent (Life) Water repellent(the resistance of fabrics to wetting by water) for life water repellent level Recommended Use Activewear, Nylon Shorts
